Jop Openings

We are constantly looking for outstanding Master students, PhD students, and Postdocs, interested in working in the field of needle segmentation and we welcome spontaneous applications.

Requirements

The Surgical Planning Laboratory and our NeedleFinder team is looking for talented Master students, PhD students or Postdocs, interested in the challenges of catheter segmentation. The perfect candidate has a strong mathematical, physical or engineering background (or equivalent), and a keen interest in image-guided therapy. Demonstrated programming skills are a plus.

How to apply

If you are interested in applying for a research trainee position with Dr. Kapur, please fill out this form.
